General

  1. Why MoRe?

General

Why MoRe?

More is meant to be a collection of Java classes that are needed in a number of agent-based simulation models that incorporate representations of social networks. Therefore, it advances the reuse of implemented algorithms and prevents inventing more and more buggy software for the same purpose.
